short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Itero is a comprehensive extension designed to help sales representatives enhance their cold calling with real-time feedback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Itero Co-Pilot: Your AI Partner for Better Live Calls

Itero Co-Pilot is here to help. Designed specifically for sales reps, our tool uses AI to make your calls more effective and your follow-ups easier.

Features Youâ€™ll Actually Use:

1.AI-Assisted Sales Content: Get instant help creating talk tracks and handling objections. Align your calls with best practices for cold calling and value selling without the hassle.

2.Real-Time Guidance: Need a nudge during a call? Itero Co-Pilot provides real-time tips to keep you on track and focused.

3.Objection Handling Made Easy: Stop losing deals to objections. Get immediate suggestions to turn objections into opportunities.

4.Works with Your Tools: Seamlessly integrate with Orum, Outreach, Salesloft, HubSpot, and Apollo. Keep your workflow smooth without switching between platforms.

5.Automated Follow-Up: Save time with automatic call summaries and follow-up emails. Spend less time on admin and more time selling.

Our mission is about giving you practical tools to improve your conversion rates and reduce the busy work. Try it out and see the difference in your sales calls.
